dataBinding.description:
Event which is raised before data binding.
    Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
    Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSparkline.
    Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource.

dataBound.description:
Event which is raised after data binding.
    Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
    Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSparkline.
    Use ui.data to obtain reference to array actual data which is displayed by chart.
    Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource.

brush.description: Gets or sets the sparkline brush.

displayNormalRangeInFront.description: Gets or sets the position of the normal range on the sparkline.

displayType.description: Gets or sets the display type of the sparkline.

valueOptions.name: line
valueOptions.description: Display the sparkline as a line.

valueOptions.name: area
valueOptions.description: Display the sparkline as a filled polygon.

valueOptions.name: column
valueOptions.description: Display the sparkline as a set of columns.

valueOptions.name: winLoss
valueOptions.description: Display the sparkline as a set of columns on a boolean scale.

firstMarkerBrush.description: Gets or sets the first marker brush of the sparkline.

firstMarkerSize.description: Gets or sets the first marker size of the sparkline.

firstMarkerVisibility.description: Gets or sets the first marker visibility of the sparkline.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: Visualize the first igSparkline marker

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: Collapse the first igSparkline marker

formatLabel.description: Sets or gets a function which takes an object that produces a formatted label for displaying in the chart.

highMarkerBrush.description: Gets or sets the high marker brush of the sparkline.

highMarkerSize.description: Gets or sets the high marker size of the sparkline.

highMarkerVisibility.description: Gets or sets the high marker visibility of the sparkline.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: Visualize the high igSparkline marker

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: Collapse the high igSparkline marker

horizontalAxisBrush.description: Gets or sets the horizontal axis line brush of the sparkline.

horizontalAxisLabel.description:
The value or content to display on the horizontal axis.
 This can be set to a formatted string, such as "{0}", or it can be set to a DataTemplate.

horizontalAxisVisibility.description: Gets or sets the display state of the horizontal axis.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: Visualize the igSparkline horizontal axis

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: Collapse the igSparkline horizontal axis

labelMemberPath.description: String identifier of a column or property name to get labels from on each item in the data source.  These labels will be retrieved from the first and last item, and displayed by the horizontal axis.

lastMarkerBrush.description: Gets or sets the last marker brush of the sparkline.

lastMarkerSize.description: Gets or sets the last marker size of the sparkline.

lastMarkerVisibility.description: Gets or sets the last marker visibility of the sparkline.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: Visualize the last igSparkline marker

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: Collapse the last igSparkline marker

lineThickness.description: Gets or sets the line thickness of the sparkline.

lowMarkerBrush.description: Gets or sets the low marker brush of the sparkline.

lowMarkerSize.description: Gets or sets the low marker size of the sparkline.

lowMarkerVisibility.description: Gets or sets the low marker visibility of the sparkline.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: Visualize the low igSparkline marker

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: Collapse the low igSparkline marker

markerBrush.description: Gets or sets the marker brush of the sparkline.

markerSize.description: Gets or sets the marker size of the sparkline.

markerVisibility.description: Gets or sets the marker visibility of the sparkline.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: Visualize the igSparkline marker

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: Collapse the low igSparkline marker

negativeBrush.description: Gets or sets the negative brush of the sparkline.

negativeMarkerBrush.description: Gets or sets the negative marker brush of the sparkline.

negativeMarkerSize.description: Gets or sets the negative marker size of the sparkline.

negativeMarkerVisibility.description: Gets or sets the negative marker visibility of the sparkline.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: Visualize the negative igSparkline marker

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: Collapse the negative igSparkline marker

normalRangeFill.description: Gets or sets the normal range brush of the sparkline.

normalRangeMaximum.description: Gets or sets the maximum value of the normal range.

normalRangeMinimum.description: Gets or sets the minimum value of the normal range.

normalRangeVisibility.description: Gets or sets the normal range visibility of the sparkline.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: Enable the normal range visibility of the sparkline

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: Disable the normal range visibility of the sparkline

trendLineBrush.description: Gets or sets the trendline brush of the sparkline.

trendLinePeriod.description: Gets or sets the trendline period used by the sparkline.

trendLineThickness.description: Gets or sets the thickness of the sparkline's trendline.

trendLineType.description: Gets or sets the type of trendline used by the sparkline.

valueOptions.name: none
valueOptions.description: Trendline is not going to be used by the sparkline

valueOptions.name: linearFit
valueOptions.description: Linear trendline is used in the sparkline

valueOptions.name: quadraticFit
valueOptions.description: Quadratic trendline is used in the sparkline

valueOptions.name: cubicFit
valueOptions.description: Cubic trendline is used in the sparkline

valueOptions.name: quarticFit
valueOptions.description: Quartic trendline is used in the sparkline

valueOptions.name: quinticFit
valueOptions.description: Quintic trendline is used in the sparkline

valueOptions.name: logarithmicFit
valueOptions.description: Logarithmic trendline is used in the sparkline

valueOptions.name: exponentialFit
valueOptions.description: Exponential trendline is used in the sparkline

valueOptions.name: powerLawFit
valueOptions.description: Power law trendline is used in the sparkline

valueOptions.name: simpleAverage
valueOptions.description: Simple average trendline is used in the sparkline

valueOptions.name: exponentialAverage
valueOptions.description: Exponential average trendline is used in the sparkline

valueOptions.name: cumulativeAverage
valueOptions.description: Modified average average trendline is used in the sparkline

valueOptions.name: weightedAverage
valueOptions.description: Weighted average average trendline is used in the sparkline

unknownValuePlotting.description: Gets or sets the way null values are interpreted.

valueOptions.name: linearInterpolate
valueOptions.description: The null values are interpreted linearly

valueOptions.name: dontPlot
valueOptions.description: The null values are not plotted

valueMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the string path to the value column.

verticalAxisBrush.description: Gets or sets the vertical axis line brush of the sparkline.

verticalAxisLabel.description:
The value or content to display on the vertical axis.
 This can be set to a formatted string, such as "{0:n}", or it can be set to a DataTemplate.

verticalAxisVisibility.description: Gets or sets the display state of the vertical axis.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: Visualize the igSparkline vertical axis

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: Collapse the igSparkline vertical axis
